I do have to admit that Republican men have drastically improved their tastes in beauty in women.
 
 Sarah Palin is actually beautiful, in a relatively natural way. She's a hundred steps upward from former Republican Beauty Queen Ann Coulter. I used to be taken quite nauseous when I saw monstrously sick-minded Republican men totally moon struck over the scrawny scarecrow Coulter. Palin is actually sexy. And, she may be a number of marbles short in her brainbox, but she's not a total nutcase like Michelle Bachmann of Minnesota. 
 
 Also, Bachmann beauty is very artificial.
 
 Both of them could use a bit of vocal training to make their voices more pleasant. They both screech.
